QuestData.Title: Stand Your Ground
QuestData.Description:
I hope this rain isn't a bad omen... this is supposed to be a simple rescue mission.
You'll be sparring with me today. We have to make sure you can handle yourself once we make landfall.
Let's see what you've got!
QuestData.RewardText: You're a skilled $c, recruit. I think you'll prove a welcome addition to the main rescue team.
